name: Text & Image Protector
author: Moein Akbarof

sections.description:
This is a really simple plugin that let you chose for each post to have image protection and/or text protection

Development Blog

Please visit the plugin page at (http://imaprogrammer.wordpress.com/2011/01/07/tiprotector/), and feel free to leave feedback, bug reports and comments.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the protect-content folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it!! Now whenever you edit a post or create a new one, you will see a small panel on the bottom right of the screen that shows the applicable options.
sections.faq:
Can I disable/enable for all of my posts?

Yes you can disable/enable the protection for all of your posts in option panel of the plugin which is called Text & Image Protector which is a submenu of settings.

What does this plugin do?

This plugin let the user protect text and/or images of any post that the user wants.

I have an idea to improve this feature further, what can I do?

You can post a comment on the page of this plugin in my wordpress weblog which is : http://imaprogrammer.wordpress.com/2011/01/07/tiprotector/
